title: Sound On: Remembering 9/11 20 Years Later  (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Remembering 9/11 20 Years Later  (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: New York Congressman John Katko, Republican and Ranking Member on the House Homeland Security Committee, Former Pennsylvania Governor Mark Schweikert, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
